header_text: In the spring, you notice your friends and neighbors have planted their gardens already. You are taking much longer than expected to plant your garden due to recent changes in your balance. You remember to take the planting one row at a time and remain patient.

elements.Text: Taking a slower approach to garden work makes the experience more...
